title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 457 - Protective Services For Adults
content:

§ 457.7 - Coordination and utilization of community resources
§ 457.8 - Annual plan for the provision of PSA

§ 457.17 to 457.18 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 457

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 309, 473, 473-a, 473-b, 473-c, 473-e;Mental Hygiene Law, art. 81

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
